page.title: 14Mr Bathos Farm
page.content: On Monday we went to Mr.Batho's farm.There used to be 3 men working on the farm but now there are only 2 men.There is 1 type of animal on his farm and that is cattle.He grows 5 inds of crops,wheat,barley(spring & winer)beans and maize.He has got 4 tractors but one was out on the field.He has got 4 combine harvestors but only one works.His most important building is his machine work shop.His cattle are a beef herd.They are 12 months old when they go to be slaughtered .In the yard there are a few bullocks being fattened up for meat.
